Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists
Jalen Duren had 14 points and 12 rebounds
Anfernee Simons had 36 points and nine assists
Shaedon Sharpe had 20 points, eight assists and eight rebounds
Tim Hardaway Jr. tied the game with a jumper with 3:39 to play
Tim Hardaway Jr. hit a 3-pointer to make it 109-106
After the teams traded baskets, Anfernee Simons hit a layup to make it a one-point game
Malik Beasley hit a 3-pointer to put the Pistons ahead 114-110
Deandre Ayton dunked for Portland with 49.5 seconds to go
Dalen Duren's putback restored the four-point lead
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Chauncey Billups was honored before the game for his contributions to Detroit's 2004 championship and his induction into the Basketball Hall of Fame
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons haven't been.500 after New Year's since it finished 41-41 in 2018-19
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Trail Blazers led by 22 points in the first half
Portland outshot Detroit 53.3% to 44.7% from the floor
Portland went 3 of 5 from the free-throw line while Detroit was 19 of 22
Pistons also had a 17-7 edge in offensive rebounds
